Audio Description: This poster about price control features black text on a white background. At the top are the words “What inflation means”. In the center are the words “Today your dollar buys…” next to a line drawing of a woman carrying six packages of varying sizes. Under this are the words “With inflation your dollar buys less”, next to a line drawing of a woman carrying two small packages. In a black box at the bottom of the poster are white letters reading “Price control helps stop inflation…support price control.”
Creator: United States. Office of Price Administration
